messages.message:
Came back to look at this and saw that you’ve already gotten these changes in--thank you! I did notice two more unexpected behaviors/bugs while using this on sandbox:

• Using the sort order icons in the *Date* column fails to reorder the rows of the Deep dive table. I.e. even as I cycle through the arrow icons, the rows stay in the same order. The other columns work as expected.
    ◦ If I’ve changed the sort order using a _different_ column, such as Units or Mode clicking the sort icon under Date does then reset the rows by date, but I can’t actually change the sort order beyond that.
• When I select a date range, I don’t think the end date is being included. E.g. if I select July 2-3, I only see results for July 2nd, or if I select July 2-8 I see results for July 2-7. 
cc @Weiming Wu @Josh Rad
thanks rosie! added your feedback to the bug bash doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CCUU5S-gNnaxMfH3VGK_8B_Rmy_O5n_g0sDOd74hYQ0/edit?tab=t.0)
Oh, thank you! If I happen to see anything else I’ll note it there.
